nodes.text: Cosian Space was a region within the Deep Core of the galaxy that contained a knot of star systems, including the Cosia system but also the planet Cos Secundu. It was the home of both the sentient Cosian species and the closely related Nu-Cosians, who were genetically engineered offshoots of the Cosians.
Cosian Space was first mentioned in Star Wars: Aliens of the Galaxy, a reference book written by Jason Fry and released on August 23, 2016.
